item.title: Set Up Raspberry Pi 4 through laptop/pc using Ethernet cable(No Monitor, No Wi-Fi)
item.description: Contents Hardware Requirements: Steps to install the required software tools Step-1: OS Download Step-2: Imager Step-3: SSH Client Download Step-4: Real VNC Viewer Step-5: Image Burning Step-6: ssh Step-7: Power Step-8: Network Connections Step-9: SSH Configuration Step-10: Authentication Step-11: Pi Terminal Accessing Pi Desktop Remotely In this we shall be working with Raspberry Pi 4 Model-B of 1Gb RAM for the set up. Raspberry-Pi is a single board computer used for educational purposes and DIY projects with an affordable cost, requires a power supply of 5 volts with 3 amps current.
